PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03302022-04-04,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to bring into force, on Behalf of Canada, the Amendments to Annexes I and II to the Protocol to the 1979 Convention on Long-Range Transboundary Air Pollution
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to BRING INTO FORCE, on behalf of Canada, the AMENDMENTS TO ANNEXES I AND II TO THE PROTOCOL TO THE 1979 CONVENTION ON LONG-RANGE TRANSBOUNDARY AIR POLLUTION, done at Aarhus on June 24, 1998, adopted at Geneva on December 18, 2009 by Decision 2009/2.
AttachmentsAttachment
